name: Don't Frolick With the Fae
description:
Created for Sheridan Fall 2020 Design Week. Designed for an arcade cabinet.

Press 1 to start
Z: Attack
X: Dodge

Zachary MacLeod - Lead Designer, Lead Programmer, Technical Artist, Sound Design
Hamzah Kashmiri - Assistant Programmer, Designer
Cheyenne Moshtagh - Lead Artist
Samir Katerynych - Level Designer
